component.name: veraPDF
component.summary: veraPDF is a file-format validator for the PDF/A archiving standard

description.p: veraPDF is a purpose-built, open source, file-format validator covering all PDF/A parts and conformance levels. veraPDF is designed to meet the needs of digital preservationists and is supported by the PDF software developer community.
